title: Mokayee Womens Summer Short Puff Sleeve Casual Semi-Formal Fit and Flare Church Wedding Guest Work Dresses with Pockets
description: ♥This simple & stylish business dresses for women featuring V neckline and puff sleeve.A flare a-line swing skirt falls from the fitted waist,easy to fits all body types

♥ Womens cute cocktail wedding guest dresses.Short puff sleeve with gathered on the shoulder brings you a charming shoulder line.Two side pockets make it easy for you to carry small items such as mobile phones.Hidden zipper at back.

♥ Ladies elegant modest pretty dresses.Hugs your fits perfectly.Relaxed fit style super flattering dress is perfect on business wear with high heel and clutch to make you look pretty and professional. You need it in your wardrobe!

♥ Trendy and unique summer knee length dress can be easily dress up and down.Suitable for a variety of occasions,daily life,office, family gathering,brunch, dinner, birthdays gifts, vacation, wedding party, vacation, homecoming, graduation, school dance ect.

♥ Fits true to size; Size Details: S ( bust-31.89 in waist-27.16 in length-38.18 in) M ( bust-33.86 in waist-29.13 in length-38.58 in) L (bust-37.0 in waist-33.28 in length-39.17 in) XL(bust-40.16 in waist-35.43 in length-39.76 in);Recommended hand wash
